state: Welcome to another life changing game of TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to attempt to venture east. And then, retrieve the TextWorld style latchkey from the floor of the cubicle. Then, unlock the TextWorld style passageway within the cubicle. Then, ensure that the TextWorld style passageway is open. Then, attempt to travel east. After that, make an attempt to head south. Then, try to venture west. And then, make an effort to move south. With that over with, head west. After that, make an attempt to travel south. Following that, venture south. With that done, go west. And then, make an effort to go to the north. If you can finish that, pick up the mug from the floor of the super hot canteen. Got that? Good! -= Cookery =- Well, here we are in the cookery. You make out a closed fridge. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a refrigerator. The refrigerator contains a keycard. There is an unguarded exit to the east. > -= Cookery =-0/1
next_state: -= Cubicle =- You are in a cubicle. A normal kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call "looking." You can see a locked coffer. There is a closed TextWorld style passageway leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the west. There is a TextWorld style latchkey on the floor. > -= Cubicle =-0/2
